messages.title: Bored of election leaflets?
messages.content: None of them are talking about what matters to people in Islington. Except this one.

messages.title: On Friday
messages.content: the Government could change to a Conservative Government.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Emily Thornberry is fighting to change this. She stands for improving council and housing association flats, addressing the issue of many Islington people living in overcrowding or having to move out.

housing.content: Emily Thornberry is fighting for affordable housing, against the Council's luxury flat plans, advocating for social housing instead.

leaflet.personalStatement: Only Emily Thornberry stands up for you.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Polls are open Thursday, 6 May, 7:00am til 10:00pm. If you have a postal vote but haven't posted it yet, take it to the polling station this Thursday.
